title: Military Officer Polo t-shirt
content:
Hello, can anyone help me identify the two font used in the polo t-shirt? Thanks!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_7438.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20090621073845/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_7438.JPG) | 671.89 KB |
author: lonevol

comments.content:
The sans serif is Helvetica Ultra Compressed

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/helvetica\_std\_ultra\_compr...](http://web.archive.org/web/20090621073845/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/helvetica_std_ultra_compressed/?&sample_text=TO%20EXCEL%20TO%20OVERCOME&sample_size=48 "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/helvetica\_std\_ultra\_compressed/?&sample\_text=TO%20EXCEL%20TO%20OVERCOME&sample\_size=48")
Thanks Marcox, anyone know the serif font?
